channel.title: Project insanity shops? updated 2nd question
channel.description:
this is my general store in shops.java - But players cant sell items to the shop they can only buy that 1 item - how do i allow players to sell to this shop
[code]shop = 22 General_Store 1 1 1540 10000[/code]

item.title: Project insanity shops? updated 2nd question
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

[quote=“crazyfazespy, post:2, topic:377214”]Well easy to add ;D
ActionHandler class
Search for: firstClickNpc
An you will see samthink like that :

case 541: c.getShops().openShop(5); break;

So you shoulkd make samthing like that

case 659: c.getShops().openShop(*); break;
case 659: is ur npc id
c.getShops().openShop(); ("" is ur shop id)[/quote]
Perfect thanks Would rep i could

Read full topic

item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

Well easy to add ;D
ActionHandler class
Search for: firstClickNpc
An you will see samthink like that :

case 541: c.getShops().openShop(5); break;

So you shoulkd make samthing like that

case 659: c.getShops().openShop(*); break;
case 659: is ur npc id
c.getShops().openShop(); ("" is ur shop id)
